meanings.definition: To reduce the size of a company by eliminating jobs or departments.
meanings.sent1: The company started dumbsizing, so many people lost their jobs.
meanings.sent2: The CEO decided to dumbsize the company to save money.
meanings.sent3: It seemed like a strange idea to dumbsize the business right before the holidays.
meanings.sent4: The decision to dumbsize the company was like cutting off a limb to save the body.
meanings.sent5: The impact of dumbsizing was felt throughout the entire organization.

meanings.definition: The act of downsizing in a way that is perceived as lacking intelligence or foresight.
meanings.sent1: The dumbsizing of the company led to chaos and confusion.
meanings.sent2: Many employees were unhappy with the dumbsizing of the company.
meanings.sent3: Some people found humor in the dumbsizing of the company, calling it a 'brain-dead move'.
meanings.sent4: The dumbsizing decision was like shooting oneself in the foot.
meanings.sent5: The dumbsizing strategy backfired, causing more harm than good.
